body.text: Get leverage from your Microsoft 365 content: ask Copilot to compare, extract, and turn info into actions.

facts.title: Meetings (Teams)
facts.value: "Create a recap with decisions, owners, due dates, and open questions."

facts.title: Email triage (Outlook)
facts.value: "Draft 3 replies: approve, decline, delegate. Keep each under 4 lines."

facts.title: Doc intelligence (Word)
facts.value: "Compare v1 vs v2. Summarize what changed and why it matters."

facts.title: Analysis (Excel)
facts.value: "Find anomalies, explain drivers, and propose experiments to confirm."

facts.title: Storytelling (PowerPoint)
facts.value: "Turn this doc into a narrative: problem → insight → recommendation → next steps."

facts.title: Policy check
facts.value: "Flag confidential info, compliance risks, and missing approvers."

facts.title: Copy-ready output
facts.value: "Give me an action list with owners and dates."

body.text: Tip: the best results come from the right file + the right ask. Name the doc, range, or meeting explicitly.
